suite.name: Teste case VIACEP

test.name: CT01: Consulta de CEP com dados válidos

kw.name: GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://viacep.com.br/ws/01001000/json?callback=CEP path_url=/ws/01001000/json?callback=CEP headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.4', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=https://viacep.com.br/ws/01001000/json?callback=CEP status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'nginx/1.22.0', 'Date': 'Sat, 12 Jul 2025 15:12:42 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/javascript; charset=utf-8', 'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Vary': 'Accept-Encoding', 'Expires': 'Sat, 12 Jul 2025 16:12:42 GMT', 'Cache-Control': 'max-age=3600, public', 'Pragma': 'public', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET', 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'Content-Type, X-Request-With, X-Requested-By', 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials': 'true', 'Access-Control-Max-Age': '86400', 'Content-Encoding': 'gzip'} body=CEP({ "cep": "01001-000", "logradouro": "Praça da Sé", "complemento": "lado ímpar", "unidade": "", "bairro": "Sé", "localidade": "São Paulo", "uf": "SP", "estado": "São Paulo", "regiao": "Sudeste", "ibge": "3550308", "gia": "1004", "ddd": "11", "siafi": "7107" });
${response} = <Response [200]>
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
